name: Mexi-Pulled Chicken Sandwich
description: Mmmm, a delicious fusion of Mexican street food and the classic panini. Tender, slow-cooked meat and vibrant Tex-Mex inspired spices make this a handheld sensation for any occasion, from casual weeknight dinners to backyard BBQ’s to leftover facelifts.

ingredients.name: medium-sized panini buns or chopped baguette
Slow Cooker Pulled Pork or Chicken Barbacoa
boneless pork shoulder or butt roast

preparation: Dice tomato; place in a bowl. Add salsa mix and lime juice, if using. Let stand 10 min.
Meanwhile, slice pepper. Cut avocado into cubes. Slice buns open and toast, if desired.
Fill each bun with chicken; add pepper and avocado. Top with salsa.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced fresh veggies and 2 tbsp Epicure Dip, your choice.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Pulled Pork Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: This seasoning is a shortcut to the south when you’re in the mood for some BBQ! Grab a slow cooker and let the pork slowly infuse with notes of deep, sweet ‘n tangy barbecue and a hint of smokiness. So good!

products.name: Chicken Barbacoa Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Your new go-to for tasty tacos, enchiladas, and burritos! Chicken Barbacoa is for those who like a smoky mild-medium heat. This one checks all the boxes: it’s big batch-friendly, a one-pot meal, crowd-pleasing, and easy to customize.
